item.title: Hall_of_fame
item.description: See the previous years of CyberTractor Challenge Check out our hall of fame! Pictures from the previous years of CyberTractor Challenge are below. Class of 2025 Class of 2024 Class of 2023

item.title: Thank You to Our 2025 CyberTractor Challenge Sponsors!
item.description: The 2025 CyberTractor Challenge set new standards with expanded classes, advanced technical content, and a stronger community. Thanks to our outstanding sponsors and supporters, this year demonstrated our growth and potential. We aimed to create a more impactful CyberTractor Challenge, and our sponsors’ support made this vision a reality. Who Are Our Sponsors This year’s event was made possible by the generous support of the following organizations: Platinum Sponsors John Deere Gold Sponsors

item.title: 2025_selection
item.description: 2025 CyberTractor Challenge Student Selections Completed! The CyberTractor Challenge team is excited to announce that student selections for the 2025 CyberTractor Challenge have been completed! We are thrilled to welcome a diverse group of talented students from across the country who will be joining us in June for this unique opportunity to learn, collaborate, and innovate in the field of agriculture cybersecurity. The CyberTractor Challenge exists to develop talent and build community to solve hard and interesting problems related to the security of modern connected agricultural equipment.

item.title: Sponsorship Drive
item.description: Update! Click HERE to submit your official offer of sponsorship for the 2025 CyberTractor Challenge Dear Visionaries, Innovators, and those linked to the land, I am excited to announce that we are gearing up for the 4th Annual CyberTractor Challenge, set for June 16-20, 2025, near the dynamic campus of Iowa State University, and it’s that time where we must start on the process of finding sponsors! With preparations already underway from curriculum planning by our esteemed Board of Directors to student recruitment â€” we are on the threshold of bringing another groundbreaking event to life.

item.title: Apply to the 2025 CyberTractor Challenge!
item.description: UPDATE: The application period for the 2025 CyberTractor Challenge is now CLOSED! Check back in early 2026 for applications to the 2026 CyberTractor Challenge to open! Happy Holidays Cybersecurity Enthusiasts and Ag-Tech Innovators! Grab your overalls, throw on some boots, and get ready for the 2025 CyberTractor Challenge! Join us on June 15-20, 2025 in the heartland of the USA to learn from industry leaders, academic instructors, experts, and our generous sponsors about the exciting field of agriculture cybersecurity!

item.title: Thank you to our 2024 CyberTractor Challenge Sponsors!
item.description: We would like to extend our heartfelt gratitude to our 2024 CyberTractor Challenge sponsors. Our sponsors share our commitment to fostering a more secure agricultural industry by educating the next generation of agricultural & cybersecurity professionals with the knowledge and skills necessary to tackle the unique cybersecurity challenges facing modern farming. Our Sponsors This year, we are proud to partner with the following sponsors whose support and commitment to our cause helps us achieve our goals.
